module.name: ap236_furniture_catalog_and_interior_design
module.keywords: module, furniture product, interior design, catalog

purpose.p: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the representation of furniture products catalogues and interior design projects
purpose.note: This application module is the top module for the specification of the ISO 10303-236 application protocol.

outscope.li: other space definitions than building room.

uof.name: Furniture_catalogue
uof.description: The Furniture_catalogue UoF specifies the data types needed to represent furniture products, their structure, their variants and their finishing.

uof.name: Interior_design
uof.description: The Interior_design UoF specifies the data types needed to represent The information that constitutes the specification for the evaluation and the manufacturing of a decorated room.
